data.title: Best Movies Like Underworld
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Underworld: Underworld: Evolution (2006), Underworld: Rise of the Lycans (2009), Underworld: Awakening (2012), Underworld: Blood Wars (2016), Blade II (2002), Daybreakers (2009), Van Helsing (2004), Red Riding Hood (2011), Dracula Untold (2014), Blade (1998)
